Segment.name: SN1
Segment.comment: To specify line-item detail relative to shipment

Field.name: AssignedIdentification
Field.comment: Alphanumeric characters assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

Field.name: NumberOfUnitsShipped
Field.comment: Numeric value of units shipped in manufacturer's shipping units for a line item or transaction set

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode1
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: QuantityShippedToDate
Field.comment: Number of units shipped to date

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode2
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: ReturnableContainerLoadMakeUpCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the load make-up of the returnable containers in the shipment

Field.name: LineItemStatusCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the action taken by the seller on a line item requested by the buyer

SyntaxNote.name: P0506
SyntaxNote.comment: If either SN105 or SN106 is present, then the other is required.
